info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 4:59PM CDT until April 10 at 2:12PM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in New Orleans LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana...
Bogue Chitto River Near Bush affecting St. Tammany Parish.
For the Bogue Chitto River...including Tylertown, Franklinton, Bush...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Bogue Chitto River near Bush.
* WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Thursday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The access road upstream of the bridge will flood. The river will leave the main channel on the left bank below the bridge flooding woodlands on either side of Louisiana Highway 21.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 5.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday morning to a crest of 11.5 feet Wednesday morning then begin falling. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations.
The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 900 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON
